A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to finally see the rest of Luke Skywalker's story.  I expected what happened to Luke post-RotJ to matter\, to have some meaning and significance beyond Luke being just another figure in the wider story. This movie\, for me at least\, robbed him of the centrality of his story and didn't even bother telling most of what happened to him at all. To say it was painful is an understatement.  Awful.
